home.secureDesc: Your data is protected with industry-standard security

restriction.firstLoginBody: You're currently on the FREE PLAN with limited features. Upgrade your plan to enjoy unlimited access to all our features.
restriction.documentsLimitBody: Your plan allows access to {{count}} documents. Upgrade to view more documents and get unlimited access.
restriction.cataloguesLimitBody: Your plan allows access to {{count}} catalogues. Upgrade to view more catalogues and get unlimited access.
restriction.bookmarksLimitBody: Your plan allows {{count}} bookmarks. Upgrade to save more articles and get unlimited bookmarks.
restriction.notesLimitBody: Your plan allows {{count}} notes. Upgrade to add more notes to your materials.
